title: It’s A Simple Thing | Joel Osteen
itunes:title: It’s A Simple Thing | Joel Osteen
description:
God can take simple, ordinary things and make them extraordinary. Get ready for Him to do something amazing in your life! 

 

Your best days are still ahead, and together we can make a difference in this world with the message of God's hope and love.

To give visit JoelOsteen.com/GiveHope

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
